```{r}
ti <- read.table(file="../data/titanic.txt", header=TRUE)
head(ti)
table(ti$Sex, ti$Survived)
prop.table(table(ti$Sex, ti$Survived), margin=1)
tapply(ti$Age, ti$Survived, mean, na.rm=TRUE)
mean(ti$Age, na.rm=TRUE)
```
